outputs.output_descr: Reintegration of ex-combatants implemented accordance with the National DDR Strategic Plan, with support from UNMIS.

donor_name: MINISTRY  OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS & COOPERATION OF SPAIN
outputs.output_descr:
The Multi-year DDR Programme aims at contributing to the implementation of CPA by creating an enabling environment to enhance security through the provision of technical and material support to national authorities charged with the design and implementing a comprehensive programme of DDR.  The DDR programme will focus on the reintegration of XCs and SNGs as the main target group and will link with other national recovery and priority programmes aimed at other vulnerable groups ie. returnees, Internally Displaced Persons and host communities to facilitate a community driven approach to reintegration.  Linkages to support a community-driven approach will be guided through coordination with reintegration fora comprising national and international actors. Efforts will include timing and sequencing based on pre-empting security threats and prioritizing trust fund project implementation, such as the Multi-donor Trust Fudn and Sudan Recovery Fund, based on threat assessments. The total target group through of the programme is:

Target Group	SAF	SPLA	Total Caseload
Target of XCs and SNGS	90,000	90,000	180,000

Social reintegration support and Community Security and Arms Control pilot projects implemented in prioirtized areas of South Kordofan State, Blue Nile State, and Central Sector to support community -based reintegration ,reconcilation and security initatives. The purpose of this project  is to ensure Disarmament Demobilization and Reintegration programme's contribution  to sustainble livelihood, peace and secruity in the most affected by conflicts areas of Sudan .

project_descr: Sudan Multi Year Disarmament Demobilization and Reintegration Programme
